abstract: True to form for the network, many of the shows are aimed at women, and two have ties to ABC’s parent, the Walt Disney Company.
snippet: True to form for the network, many of the shows are aimed at women, and two have ties to ABC’s parent, the Walt Disney Company.
lead_paragraph: The broadcast networks have ordered what is surely a record number of new series for the next television season, including ABC’s announcement on Friday of a long list of programs.

headline.main: ABC Introduces 12 New Series for Next Season
headline.print_headline: ABC Introduces 12 New Series for Next Season
